title: ‘A New Challenge’: Can Anybody Outclimb Pogačar? Is Vollering Still Queen of the Hills? Amstel Gold Race Primer
content:
Comebacks, world champions, and super-deep startlists drive the narratives as Pidcock, Longo Borghini, Evenepoel, Kopecky take on the peloton's two prime puncheurs.

Read the full article at ‘A New Challenge’: Can Anybody Outclimb Pogačar? Is Vollering Still Queen of the Hills? Amstel Gold Race Primer on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
